mapper.select: SELECT r.resumeNum, r.userId, r.resumeTitle, r.resumePhone, r.resumeContent, r.portfolioName, r.personalPhotoName, r.education, r.school, r.address, r.roleId, r.militaryService, r.createdDate, r.updatedDate FROM Resumes r JOIN Resumeapplystatus ras ON r.resumeNum = ras.resumeNum WHERE ras.applicationNum = #{applicationNum};
SELECT count(r.resumeNum) AS count FROM Resumes r JOIN Resumeapplystatus ras ON r.resumeNum = ras.resumeNum WHERE ras.applicationNum = #{applicationNum};

SELECT r.resumeNum, r.userId, r.resumeTitle, r.resumePhone, r.resumeContent, r.portfolioName, r.personalPhotoName, r.education, r.school, r.address, r.roleId, r.militaryService, r.createdDate, r.updatedDate FROM Resumes r JOIN Resumeapplystatus ras ON r.resumeNum = ras.resumeNum WHERE ras.applicationNum = #{applicationNum} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{itemsPerPage};
